description: Non material amendments involving alterations to the fenestration, openings, rooflights and louvres, reduction in height of sprinkler tank fencing, addition of engineering brick, and the introduction of a rooftop mansafe system at Mandeville Special School; alterations to the fenestration, louvres, ventilation grilles, canopies, rooflights, photovoltaic arrays, rainwater pipe, and colour of render panels, and provision of a sprinkler cupboard and rooftop mansafe system to Horsenden Primary School and alterations to fire escape access route, cycle storage, provision of retaining wall and fence in place of ramp between schools and additional access/escape gate to Mandeville School to deemed consent P/2013/4808 dated 20 December 2013 for internal and external alterations to existing building including the erection of a single storey lobby extension and enclosure of sprinkler tank and erection of part single and two storey building linked to the South side of Mandeville Special School to provide classrooms, hall and associated accommodation; erection of part single and two storey building for Horsenden Primary School in South part of site with covered walkways linking to existing school and Children's Centre; alterations to hard and soft landscaping, including the provision of new and revised play areas, multi-use games area, retaining walls, embankments and tree planting and alterations to minibus parking and manoeuvring area accessed off Burwell Avenue to provide an additional 10 minibus parking spaces.
